entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -2.3°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or flurries ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 6:34 PM NDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
